PathOfBuilding.Notes:
This build's defense layer has been adapted from brittleknee's Archmage Bladefall/Blade Blast Hierophant. Since the Occultist's defense has been nerfed by patches and the overall defense options in the Witch area suck, a new way was needed.
Because of the massive Lightning Damage bonus from Arcane Cloak Lightning Trap might be a better alternative to Fire Trap. Also requires less Dex. Due to changes to Fortify and Movement Skills in the recent patches a new Movement Skill has to be found Need to check if Second Wind still works with Arcane Cloak after patches
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --- INFORMATIONS -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Arcane Blessing gives "permanent" Arcane Surge (+100% increased effect due to passive skills) = Increased Mana Regeneration AND Damage Buff - Thanks to high mana regen you will almost never run out of mana - Build feels pretty beefy thanks to Arcane Cloak, Mind Over Matter, The Agnostic, high regen and other ways to gain mana/life, Fortify, high Block Chance (Glancing Blows), permanent endurance charges and high resistances - There are many ways to extend the defense of this build. - In comparison to other builds were Arcane Surge and Clarity are normally kept at a low level you actually want them at max level - CWDT cannot really be used - Wave of Conviction can't be used because Arcance Cloaks buff to Lightning damage is too high (+ over 2000 Lightning Damage) - When there's enough regen available Righteous Fire can be used to increase damage output
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --- DEFENSE LAYERS -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Fortify reduces incoming hit damage by 20% - 60%+ Block Chance for Attacks, Projectiles and Spells due to passive skills, Tempest Shield and Glancing Blows - Glancing Blows still lets 65% damage through - Leaving out Glancing Blows would actually increase the survival chances, but a few mechanics depend on it: - "+X Life/Mana on Block" on Shields - "+x% Mana Regeneration per Spell Block Chance" - Blocking refreshes Tempest Shield. Tempest Shield could be used in the Curse Setup - With Arcane Cloak 75% of incoming hit damage is taken from Buff first (which depends on available mana) before Life - With Mind over Matter and Divine Guidance 40% of damage is taken from Mana first - Permanent Endurance Charges from Conviction of Power reduces physical and elemental damage by 16% - The Agnostic regenerates 20% of unreserved mana per second as life, lowering Damage over Time impact (Traps are a non-issue)
- CWDT + Immortal Call can be used if there are sockets left. It shares a cooldown with Arcane Cloak but it can reduce unexpected damage. Immortal Call can't use the permanent Endurance Charges from Conviction of Power
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --- MANA MANAGEMENT -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Dynamo fills Mana directly up after Arcane Cloak use
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --- SKILL LINKS -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DAMAGE: ------------------- - Fire Trap (G) + Trap and Mine Damage (G) + Efficacy (B) + Burning Damage (R) + (4-6 Link) - Bear Trap (G) + Trap and Mine Damage (G) + ... Culling Strike (G) ? + Added Fire Damage (R) (4 Link)
DEFENSE: ------------------- - Arcane Cloak (B) + Arcance Surge (B) + Second Wind Support (G) + Increased Duration (R) (4 Link)
CURSE SETUP: ------------------- - Flammability (B)
AURAS: ------------------- - Vitality (R) - Could remove it once The Agnostic is taken, but it provides good life regen for no cost (in this build) - Clarity (B)
MOVEMENT: ------------------- - Shield Charge (R) + Fortify (R) + Faster Attacks (G) (3 Link) - Kinda janky to use - Dash (G)
OTHERS: ------------------- - Summon Stone Golem (R) - Could remove it once The Agnostic is taken, but it provides good life regen
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --- CHANGELOG -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
16.05.2021 --------------
